amendment.description: To fully fund the FIRE and SAFER Acts and reduce tax breaks for certain individuals.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2789 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 55. Record Vote Number: 42.

action.text: Amendment SA 2789 proposed by Senator Sarbanes. (consideration: CR S2606-2611, S2640-2641; text: CR S2606) To fully fund the FIRE and SAFER Acts and reduce tax breaks for certain individuals.
